title: Content Designer
description:
We are looking for a Content Designer to join Haglöfs Brand & Marketing Department in Stockholm, Sweden.
  
  

At Haglöfs, our mission is to enhance the quality of life, not only for our consumers through the exceptional outdoor products we produce but also for our employees. Working at Haglöfs is more than just a job; it's an opportunity to merge a life filled with inspiring colleagues and exciting tasks with your passion for the outdoors.
  
  

Haglöfs is set on a global growth-, and transformation journey. As part of a new creative in-house team the Content Designer is central to creating strong commercial-, and brand building campaigns and content.
  
  

The Content Designer at Haglöfs will foremost create and tailor consumer centric content for our digital platforms. With digital first approach the designer will lead the design direction and execution of campaigns and content with high focus on securing brand alignment and excellence.
  
  

The role will create engaging content for the website, campaign sites, social media, and other digital channels. The Content Designer will ensure the visual and interactive elements are optimized for our digital audiences while maintaining brand consistency and progressiveness. By crafting dynamic, platform-specific designs, the Content Designer will play a crucial role in amplifying Haglöfs’ campaigns in the digital space.
  
  

Haglöfs is a dynamic and global organization, where teamwork and passion are key factors for our success. As Haglöfs is set on a progressive global growth and transformation journey the role requires strong winning attitude and creative leadership skills.
  
  

The consumer is our focus and central to everything we do. Therefor the role requires a deep understanding of the brand and various segments of outdoor consumers.
  
  

The position is based at our HQ in Alvik, Stockholm and will report directly to the Head of Marketing.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

Be a leading player in the creative team and take a central role in concept, campaign and content creation.
  
With progressive approach create content based on our brand platform.
  
Design engaging content for websites, campaign microsites, social media, and other digital platforms.
  
Develop interactive and visually compelling assets, such as banners, animations, GIFs, and carousel posts.
  
Adapt seasonal campaign designs for digital-first platforms, ensuring consistency with overarching campaign themes.
  
Ensure all designs are optimized for accessibility, and user experience.
  
Provide creative support to e-commerce and marketing teams for promotional events and product launches.
  
Develop templates for recurring digital content needs to streamline processes.
  
Use AI tools and design software features to enhance productivity and creativity.
  
Skills & Requirements
  
  

**The ideal candidate will bring:**  

Experience in outdoor or lifestyle brands and a passion for the outdoor industry.
  
Proven experience in digital design, preferably in a content-focused or in-house role for a minimum of 3 years.
  
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects) and Figma
  
Experience designing for various digital platforms, including social media, web, and mobile-first experiences.
  
Ability to create motion graphics, animations, and interactive elements to enhance engagement as well as film editing skills.
  
Strong understanding of UX/UI principles and how they apply to visual storytelling.
  
Knowledge of optimizing designs for web performance.
  
Awareness of digital design trends and the ability to implement them innovatively.
  
Familiarity with HTML/CSS or web design tools is a plus.
  
Skilled in AI tools and design software.
  
Fluency in both English and Swedish.
  
Portfolio aligned with creative esthetics of brand.
  
  

Does this sound like you and are you interested to know more? Just reach out and we will connect!
  
  

Do you want more insight to the Haglöfs brand before applying, pls visit www.haglofs.com
  
  

We review applications continuously and application deadline is 2nd of March. Pls apply with Cover Letter and Portfolio.
  
  

We are looking forward to talking to you!
  
  

Great Place to Work
  
  

Haglöfs is all about improving the quality of life. Both for consumers, through the outstanding outdoor products we produce, and for our employees.
  
  

In other terms, Haglöfs is more than a job. It’s an opportunity to combine a life filled with inspiring colleagues and exciting tasks with your outdoor interests. If this sounds like life-quality to you, check out our job openings and do not hesitate to apply.
  
  

GENUINE
  
Be true to yourself, and others
  
  

CURIOUS
  
Keep an open mind and look forward
  
  

COURAGEOUS
  
Show dedication and strive to go beyond, inspire others to follow
  
  

Clara Tronet Guillon | Contact Person

title: LIA/Praktik - Grafisk Design / Content Creator
description:
**Är du en student med ett stort intresse för grafisk design, digitalt innehåll och skönhetsbranschen? Vill du utvecklas i en kreativ miljö där du får jobba hands-on med att skapa visuellt material för e-handel och marknadsföring? Då har vi en spännande praktikplats för dig på Skinroller!**


**Observera att praktiken måste ingå i en CSN-berättigad utbildning.**

#### **Vad du kommer att göra:**


**Grafisk Design & Innehållsskapande:**  

Du kommer att skapa visuellt material för vår webbplats, sociala medier, annonser och nyhetsbrev. Detta inkluderar både statiskt och rörligt innehåll, såsom produktbilder, banners, reels och stories.


**Webbdesign & UX:**  

Uppdatera och optimera vår webb med grafiskt innehåll för att skapa en snygg och konverterande upplevelse för våra besökare.


**Social Media & Kampanjer:**  

Designa material för våra kampanjer, influencer-samarbeten och e-handelsplattformar. Du får chansen att bidra till vår visuella identitet och skapa engagerande content för vår målgrupp.


**Lära dig marknadsföring & branding:**  

Även om vi inte har en in-house designer i dagsläget, finns massor att lära sig om hur design och marknadsföring går hand i hand. Vi testar, analyserar och itererar – här får du en förståelse för hur design påverkar konvertering, varumärke och försäljning.

#### **Vem du är:**


Du har ett stort intresse för grafisk design och digitalt innehåll.  

Du har erfarenhet av eller kunskap inom Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects) och Figma.  

Du är kreativ, noggrann och gillar att ta egna initiativ.  

Du vill utvecklas inom e-handel och förstå hur design kan påverka försäljning och varumärkesuppfattning.  

Erfarenhet av motion design eller videoredigering är meriterande.  

**Praktiken måste vara en del av en CSN-berättigad utbildning.**

title: Senior Front-End Mobile Engineer (React Native)
description:
**Heja is on a mission** to unite 1.5 billion people in the world of youth sports. This is an opportunity to make a real social impact on children's health and lifestyle at scale. In a few years, we've grown to over 3 million users in over 50+ countries; mainly from the US, UK, New Zealand, and Australia. Thousands more are joining every day to meet, unite and develop - together.


As a Senior React Native Engineer you'll make sure that the look and feel of Heja is a best in class experience. You’ll join a curious, open-minded, and self-governing team. We're honest and not afraid to speak our minds, and rely on the trust, support, and knowledge of our teammates. We're motivated by solving problems and building elegant, straightforward solutions. We'd like you to share this passion with us.


We're a talented, passionate, and ambitious product-driven company from Sweden on a global mission. Join us!

### **In this position, you will...**

* Craft beautiful experiences in the Heja App for our users
* Build solutions with high performance in mind
* Work close with everyone in the Product team adding new features and improving existing
* Be challenged, learn, and share your own learnings
* Have a big impact on our ways of working, with the strive to always be better
  

  

### **The role is perfect if you have experience and interest in...**

* Mobile Development with React Native
* Creating Animations
* UI/UX Design and Beautiful Apps
  

  

*We are not superhumans and we don’t expect you to be one either. We will all make mistakes, we just expect that we will learn from them and that we always embrace new challenges.*

### **Recruitment process**

* **Introduction and Culture interview -** We'll get to know each other better.
* **Technical home assignment**
* **Skillset interview -** Technical interview where we deep dive into your background and knowledge with the team.
* **Culture interview -** Final interview around discussing values and culture.
  

  

*We value diversity of perspective and seek to build an inclusive workplace that welcomes people from all different backgrounds.*

title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description:
Are you ready for something fresh and exciting, a chance to dive into some cool, new tech?

  

Moralis is looking for a highly motivated and experienced **Senior Frontend Engineer**.  

  

We are on a mission to dethrone Robinhood! For far too long, the centralized fintech cabal has been extracting hard-earned money from our fellow degens.  

  

**We are building a decentralized Robinhood that is purely on-chain, where all fees are going to the community without any extraction from useless middlemen.**  

  

You'll work with the most welcoming team in blockchain in a fully remote, fast-paced, and cutting-edge environment.  

  

Join us to create the most compelling crypto data company by leading the charge in crypto data quality, setting new industry standards, and delivering data solutions that unlock opportunities for growth and success.  

  

**No normal people - only pirates and romantics!**

 **About the role ‍‍**


As a Senior Frontend Engineer, you must be able and confident to lead builds of projects from design to production. You will be open and able to communicate with the necessary teams. Collaboration and innovation are part of your DNA. You always make decisions based on delivering the best user experience (UX) and developer experience (DX).

  

We are the front line of Web3; a lot depends on our amazing work, so here is a list of duties we expect everyone to respect and live up to.


If a user interacts with it, we will give it our utmost care, thought, and compassion.  

  

We want all products we build to be:

* Responsive UI
* Accessible for all users
* Cross-device compatible
* 100% matching and respecting the designs
* Optimized for the best UX

  

We will achieve this by forming strong relationships with our fellow teams:* QA
* Design
* Backend
* Support / Business / Research

  

We will always have a “no blame, let's fix it together” attitude.
We will always respect ourselves, our team members, the Moralis staff, and our community.  

  

**About you ‍️‍️**  

  

* You onboard quickly into the project.
* You require very little management and are mostly self-going.
* You can contribute independently and self-manage your tasks and projects.
* You are self-motivated and always go the extra mile to deliver extra value to Moralis thus inspiring the other team members.
* You take the responsibility to quickly learn and follow Moralis coding style and guidelines resulting in less back-and-forth regarding MR approvals.
* You know Moralis Values, resulting in smooth collaboration, faster decisions, and more output.
* You take responsibility for sustaining the code base by flagging tech debt, potential scalability issues, and other ways the code base may improve.
* You are hungry to be a Maintainer of their assigned code repositories, achieved by offering great merge request feedback and being active in reviews.
* You create and implement design plans.
* You keep up to date with industry standards and innovations.
* You can handle the entire software development life cycle, end to end.
* You lead others and have others look to them for guidance.
* You have a high level of code output **DAILY**.
* You use Gitlab efficiently.
* You push for innovation, and you are happy to present new ideas and debate the best solutions.

 **Key Qualifications**

* 4+ years experience with React as a Frontend developer
* Superior knowledge of the basics: HTML, CSS & JS
* Comfortable using TypeScript as it is used for all our projects
* Strong unit testing skills with RTL, Vite Test, and Jest
* Understanding of Redux / Zustand, RTK, and FE state management in general
* Next JS experience is great but you must not be dependent on it as we only use it for some products
* Excellent understanding of git and best practices
* Strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills
* Experience being a Maintainer of large code repos
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* A fun person who brings high energy to work
* Passionate about web3
* Interest in blockchain


A plus if you have:

* Used StyledComponents
* Used Storybook
* Used Moralis
* A strong portfolio in gitHub, Codepen, or other
* Contributed to open-source projects
* Worked in a mono repo setup previously
* Knowledge of object-oriented programming
* Passion for giving tech talks and sharing knowledge
* Be confident to make show-and-tell videos for internal or external use

  

* 
* 

We truly appreciate the mindset of someone who always finds a way of improving existing work and strives to reach higher heights. In return, you’ll get to work with a fun team (we love memes and gaming), diverse (we have team members from 39 different countries all over the world! ), dedicated and forward-looking people (for real). We have a fully remote-first culture, meaning Moralis is open to everyone who is interested in working in the Metaverse.  

  

Curious about what the Moralis culture is like and how we work? Feel free to check out our onboarding course  

  



Want to take things further? Go on, send in your application, and let's Talk!

***Please ensure that all resumes and communication must be submitted in English.***

title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced Senior Frontend Engineer to join Treebula, Sweden’s leading digital marketplace for forest owners. At Treebula, we leverage innovative technology to empower forest owners, providing them with tools to optimize land management, sell timber, and explore renewable energy opportunities.


As a Senior Frontend Engineer, you’ll play a pivotal role in shaping and enhancing our platform’s user experience. You will collaborate closely with designers, backend engineers, product managers, and other stakeholders to deliver a seamless, intuitive, and high-performing frontend. Your work will directly impact our mission to create a sustainable and carbon-neutral future while supporting thousands of forest owners.

**What You’ll Do:**

* Design and implement scalable, maintainable frontend architecture using React and TypeScript.
* Collaborate closely with designers to translate designs into polished, responsive, and accessible interfaces.
* Work with backend engineers to ensure smooth integration with our Django-based APIs.
* Develop responsive, accessible, and high-performing interfaces for forest owners and other users.
* Champion best practices in frontend development, including code quality, testing, and deployment processes.
* Contribute to planning and decision-making, helping shape the roadmap for our platform.

**What We’re Looking For:**

* 5+ years of experience in frontend development with a strong focus on building scalable, user-friendly applications.
* Proven experience in building component libraries and working with CMS systems to deliver flexible, maintainable solutions.
* Deep expertise in React, TypeScript, and modern frontend tools and libraries.
* Experience with responsive design and a keen eye for UI/UX details.
* A strong track record of working in agile teams, collaborating closely with cross-functional roles.

**Bonus Points For:**

* Experience working on map applications or integrating mapping tools like Mapbox or Leaflet
* Experience in building and maintaining UI component libraries using tools like Storybook or similar.
* Knowledge of Python and Django, with the ability to collaborate closely on backend features.
* Familiarity with AWS and DevOps tools, such as Docker and Kubernetes.
* Knowledge of A/B testing methodologies and leveraging data-driven insights to optimize UX.
* Interest in forestry, sustainability, or Geographic Information Systems (GIS).

**Soft Skills We Value:**

* Adaptability: Thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment and handle evolving requirements with ease.
* Collaboration: Strong teamwork abilities for cross-functional engagement and knowledge sharing.
* Problem-Solving Mindset: Proactively identify challenges and develop innovative solutions to drive progress.

**Why Join Treebula?**


At Treebula, you’ll be part of a team that’s not just building great products but also making a real impact on the environment. We value innovation, collaboration, and sustainability, offering you the opportunity to grow your career while contributing to a greener planet.

title: UX/UI Designer
description:
We’re Talentium, a fast-growing startup revolutionizing human capital management. We’re looking for a UX/UI Designer to blend user-centric design with visually stunning interfaces, creating experiences that are both functional and beautiful. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment, have a passion for solving complex problems, and excel at balancing form and function, we want to hear from you.
  
-
  
Key Responsibilities
  
* Design intuitive user experiences: Create wireframes, prototypes, and user flows that align with business goals and user needs.
* Create visually compelling interfaces: Deliver high-fidelity designs that prioritize both usability and aesthetics for web and mobile platforms.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams: Work with product managers, developers, and stakeholders to ensure designs are implemented seamlessly.
* Conduct user research and testing: Gather insights through interviews, surveys, and usability testing to inform and refine designs.
* Maintain and expand the design system: Ensure consistency across all interfaces by contributing to and evolving Talentium’s design system.
* Translate complex concepts: Simplify workflows and interactions into intuitive and elegant design solutions.
* Iterate based on feedback: Incorporate user feedback and data to continuously improve the user experience and visual design.
* Stay ahead of trends: Keep informed about the latest UX/UI trends, tools, and techniques to bring fresh ideas to the team.


**What we're looking for:**  

* Experience: 3-5 years in UX/UI design, with a portfolio showcasing your ability to design for complex systems and create visually compelling interfaces. Preferably, experience in SaaS or recruitment platforms, or designing for B2B products.
* Proficiency in design tools: Expertise in Figma, Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite, or similar tools for creating wireframes, prototypes, and pixel-perfect designs.
* Detail-oriented: A strong eye for typography, color, layout, and overall visual harmony while ensuring usability and functionality.
* Problem-solving mindset: Capability to think critically and simplify complex interactions with a user-first approach.
* Collaboration skills: A team player who thrives in a cross-functional environment and effectively communicates with stakeholders.
* Adaptability: Able to juggle multiple projects simultaneously in a fast-paced environment.
* Customer focus: Empathy for user needs and a drive to deliver outstanding experiences that meet business goals.

title: Senior User Experience Designer
description:
Role Description:
 


* Act as a thought leader and architect for the 3D platform, ensuring that external and internal partners build solutions that align with the overall strategy.
* Be an active contributor to core functionality, taking responsibility for driving development initiatives and mentoring team members.
* Embrace ownership of solutions: build it, run it, and own it.



 Competencies:
 


* Digital: User Experience (UX)



 Experience (Years):
 



 6-8 years
 



 Essential Skills:
 


* Programming Languages & Frameworks:
* C#, C++, Python
* JavaScript, React.js, Node.js
* Three.js, Go3DThree, WebGL, Babylon.js
* 3D Knowledge:
* Knowledge of GLTF, USD formats
* Understanding of polygons, texture baking, mesh simplification, UV mapping, B-reps, and the 3D rendering process
* Tools & Platforms:
* Proficient in Azure
* Git, Jira, and Confluence
* Familiarity with common 3D DCC programs
* Communication:
* Ability to communicate IT-related topics in both clear business language and technically detailed development briefings
* Development & Strategy:
* Ability to identify and prioritize high-level initiatives ensuring development follows set-out strategy while delivering incremental progress for the business



 Desirable Skills:
 


* Ability to define the future way of working around 3D, from initial ideas to a sellable product.
* As part of the core 3D team, contribute to building the future 3D platform serving the needs of development, supply, and marketing teams.

title: Creative & Design Specialist
description:
At TECHNIA, we simplify product innovation with smart solutions that speed up time to market. Our expertise helps companies stay competitive by making processes efficient and transparent. In other words, we bring SMARTER PRODUCTS FASTER.
 



  





 Are you a creative design specialist with a keen eye for design, a passion for branding and visual storytelling? Join us in bringing ideas to life across digital and print channels!
 



  





**About the Role** 




 As a Creative & Design Specialist, you’ll collaborate with local and global teams to develop compelling marketing materials that align with TECHNIA’s brand identity and corporate guidelines. You’ll create high-impact content, spreading from video and motion graphics to digital campaigns and print materials, in order to captivate and engage our audiences.
 



  





**The profile we’re looking for has:** 



* A degree in Graphic Design or in a related field
* Previous work experience from a similar role (corporate and/or agency)
* Proven experience in developing creative concepts and content for digital campaigns
* A strong portfolio showcasing your skills in video, motion graphics, social media content, digital marketing, brochures and event graphics
* Experience from working with corporate templates & brand consistency
* Full proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite and Adobe Express: InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop, After Effects, Premiere Pro



  





**Meriting skills could include** 



* Copywriting
* Experience with HubSpot Marketing Hub, inbound marketing, email campaigns
* Experience from Social Media Management and Web Management (WordPress)
* Experience from B2B marketing
* Experience from adaptation creation using AI tools



  





 We’re seeking someone with a strong grasp of branding, UI/UX best practices, and visual storytelling. Excellent communication skills and fluency in English are essential. We value candidates who can bring fresh perspectives to our processes, and drive continuous improvement.
 



  





 At TECHNIA, we believe we are
 **SMARTER TOGETHER** 
 . You are a self-motivated, driven individual with a hands-on approach who enjoys collaborating and sharing knowledge with both internal and external stakeholders. To thrive in our team, you should be a unprestigeous doer, flexible, and able to switch seamlessly between seeing the big picture and focusing on the finer details.
 



  





**Why you should join us?** 




 We offer a dynamic, international environment, and an exciting opportunity to work with impactful projects together with a dedicated team of both local and global colleagues. You’ll work with innovative content and technical teams.
 



 The office in Stockholm is located in Hagastaden, and has both a free gym and a rooftop terrace for sunny outdoor lunches during the summer.
 



  





**What about the Process?** 




 The first interview will be with our talent acquisition manager
 



 Second call is with the marketing manager
 



 Third call we would like you to showcase your portfolio
 



 For final candidates we will ask for a personality assessment and references
 



  





 TECHNIA has a Diverse and inclusive environment. We are looking for qualified candidates irrespective of gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, race, religion, national origin, disability, or age.
 



  





 We look forward to your application!

title: Senior Product Designer to Scandic Hotels Group, Stockholm, Sweden (Office/Hybrid)
description:
***Senior Product Designer to Scandic Hotels Group, Stockholm, Sweden (Office/Hybrid)***




**Location:** 
 Stockholm
 



  





 Scandic is the largest hotel operator in the Nordics with a network of about 280 hotels and 58,000 hotel rooms in operation and under development in six countries. With a lot of curiosity and a truly customer-centric approach, we’re creating the next generation digital experiences for our customers and guests.
 



  





 Our goal is to create seamless, engaging, and intuitive experiences that drive both business growth and customer loyalty, and to support this journey we’re looking for a Senior Product Designer to join our Digital Experience team. In this role, you’ll be at the heart of shaping Scandic’s next-generation digital services – working across the entire product development process, from strategic problem-solving to pixel-perfect execution. You will play a key role in defining user-focused experiences that not only look stunning but also drive measurable business impact.
 



  





**What you’ll do:** 



* Own the design process from ideation and prototyping to high-fidelity execution and developer handoff
* Lead UX and UI efforts and solve complex design challenges to ensure our digital products deliver both usability and delight.
* Use insights and business goals together with customer feedback and real-life data to inform design decisions that create value.
* Advocate for accessibility to ensure our products are inclusive and user-friendly, while keeping track of design trends, principles and best practices.
* Collaborate with product owners, developers, researchers and design colleagues to push digital experiences forward



  





**Skills & Requirements** 




**Who are you?** 



* 6+ years of experience in digital product design, working across UX and UI for web and mobile
* A strategic mindset with the ability to balance design decisions with commercial impact
* A strong portfolio showcasing your ability to solve usability challenges while delivering beautiful, intuitive UI
* Skilled in design tools like Figma, with documented experience of working within, and evolving, design systems
* Comfortable in agile environments, working in cross-functional teams and participating in sprints, design critiques, and retrospectives
* Excellent communication skills with the ability to collaborate effectively across disciplines
* Full working proficiency in English. Swedish is a plus but not required.



  





**About Scandic:** 




 Scandic Hotels is highly committed and proactive when it comes to Diversity & Inclusion initiatives. We are also a responsible corporate citizen and actively engaged in sustainability efforts. We have a long legacy of driving sustainability action in the hospitality industry. With around 20 000 team members, over 10 million guests and 4 million meetings a year – we have great power to drive transformation and inspire change at scale, for a better and more sustainable tomorrow.
 



  





 Our HQ is situated in newly renovated spaces right by Hagaparken on Sveavägen 167 in Stockholm. We love to be in the office but are a flexible workplace and offer a hybrid setup that suits our team members. Join in on our warm and inclusive culture and take part in all our different social activities.
 



  





**How to apply:** 




 We welcome applications in either Swedish or English. Please attach your CV and portfolio.
 



 We are not able to provide any relocation assistance and will therefore only accept applicants already based in Sweden.
 



  





 Due to GDPR, we only accept applications through our website.
 



 We're excited to hear from you soon!
 



  





**About the company** 




 We know that we reach further when we assent to our differences. At Scandic we want you to be yourself and develop in the direction you want to go, with the foundation of safe conditions and fair agreements. Bring your experiences, engagement and your way of thinking – contribute to a culture where we genuinely care about each other, our guests and our planet. Welcome to Scandic.
 



  





 Do you share our values?
 



  





**BE A PRO** 
**BE YOU** 
**BE CARING** 
**BE BOLD** 




  





**Contact Person** 




 Michaela Liljedahl
 



 Michaela.Liljedahl@scandichotels.com

title: Business Analyst within eHealth
description:
Cambio is one of the Nordics' leading suppliers in e-health with a comprehensive offering for the entire health and care chain. Our e-health solutions support healthcare professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish health and social care. We are growing continuously and now have about 1000 employees in several countries.
   

  

**The position**
 As a Business Analyst, you will be a part of an agile development team including developers, testers, architects, product owner and other business analysts. You will together with a solution team investigate and analyze needs, detail requirements, and design solutions for software used in critical care in the Nordic countries. You are an important link between the developers and the customer, with the mission to understand the needs of our end users and translate them into a way that enables the technical teams to build solutions. You often get to follow an initiative all the way from pre-study to development and implementation at the customer's premises. As part of our team, you will do meaningful work where you help to improve and digitize healthcare processes.
   

  

 We are currently looking for Business Analysts who will be working with one of our products used as decision support in the most vulnerable part of the hospitals. You will be working with creating mostly functional requirements but may also need to support non-functional requirements.
   

  

 At Cambio, we encourage taking initiatives that contribute to the development of the company and ourselves. For us, it is important that you should have the opportunity to grow, both as a person and as an employee. Our culture is described through the words “Trust”, “Care” and “Together” which permeate everything we do.
   

  

**Requirements** 
  

  

* >3 years of working with business analysis, requirement analysis, product design or similar.
* Great knowledge in how business needs can be translated into software requirements.
* 
* Great ability to collaborate with product owner(s), architects, system developers and UX designers.
* Communicates fluently in Swedish and English in speech and writing.


**It's a bonus if you**
* Experience of health informatics, and/or integration work (e.g. API design).
* Knowledge of healthcare standards and specifications (FHIR, HL7v2, RIVTA, OpenEHR, SNOMED CT)
* Previously have worked within healthcare, preferably from ICU or AN
* Experience in working with agile software development
* Experience in UX design


**Place of employment** 
 : Stockholm or Linköping
   

  

 At Cambio we value a healthy work-life balance, and to encourage that we apply a hybrid working-model. Together with your team you decide which days you work at the office. On the remaining days you can work remotely from home, but you are always more than welcome to work at the office too.
   

  

**Scope** 
 : Full time
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
   

  

**Other:** 
 We screen the applications and hold interviews continuously so please send your application as soon as possible via the link.
   

  

 We encourage and eagerly welcome all applications, but we will only consider candidates who are located and have the legal right to work in Sweden
 **.** 
 We will ask for verification during the process.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
 Read more about us
 **here!**
 Are you interested in Cambio but you don’t feel that this position is the perfect match? Check out our other open positions at the career site
 **here!**
 Cambio Healthcare Systems is Sweden’s leading suppliers of healthcare information systems and a growing player in the European market with just over 100,000 users across general and university hospitals, specialist units and outpatient units. Through the use of our integrated solutions, our customers provide services to 4 million patients.

title: Product Marketing Manager
description:
**Stockholm**
 MAJORITY is a groundbreaking mobile banking service built for migrants, by migrants. Global migration is a 21st-century reality, whether people are following their dreams, love, or new experiences. Our purpose at MAJORITY is to empower the ambitious, the brave, and the talented and help them achieve their dreams. We believe that everyone deserves the same opportunity to succeed. Thus, our mission is to provide migrants the tools they need to thrive in their new country. Come join us!
   

  

 We are MAJORITY, people without borders from 20+ countries around the world. The most important thing for us is working with ambitious people who are passionate about making a difference and keen to help us achieve our mission. Does that sound like you? Then we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

 We are looking for a passionate and driven Product Marketing Manager to join our Product team on their exciting journey to build and roll out the premiere banking and multi-service solution for migrants and internationals. This position will oversee the messaging, tone, and brand strategy for MAJORITY’s products. You will work closely with Product Managers, Product Designers, and the Marketing team to deliver go-to-market strategies, product communication, and UX copy. This is an in-person position based out of our Stockholm office and reports to the Chief Product Officer.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
**Product Marketing**
* Develop and execute go-to-market strategies for new product features and updates within the mobile banking app.
* Craft compelling messaging that communicates the value proposition to various customer segments across channels.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, design, and engineering, to align product positioning with market needs and user feedback.
* Conduct competitive analysis to understand market trends, identify opportunities, and refine positioning.
* Create sales enablement materials such as product one-pagers, FAQs, and presentations to support internal teams.
* Track and analyze key performance metrics to optimize marketing efforts and improve product adoption.


**Copywriting**
* Write clear, concise, and user-centric copy for in-app messages, onboarding flows, transactional notifications, and error messages.
* Ensure the voice and tone of the app copy aligns with the brand guidelines and resonates with users;Ensure consistency in brand messaging across all customer touchpoints, including in-app content, marketing campaigns, and external communications.
* Collaborate with product designers and product managers to ensure the copy enhances the user experience and guides users through app interactions smoothly.
* Develop a style guide for in-app copy to maintain consistency across all touchpoints within the app.
* Oversee the end-to-end translation process of app content into Spanish to ensure accuracy, cultural relevance, and compliance with regulatory requirements.
* Develop and implement brand experiences for new products and features that align with the existing MAJORITY app's identity and tone of voice.
* Maintain and evolve the MAJORITY brand guidelines to reflect the growth of new product offerings while maintaining core brand values.


**Qualifications**
* 4+ years of experience in Copywriting, Communications, or Product Marketing
* Bachelor’s degree preferred
* Native-level communication skills in English required; Spanish language fluency is a huge plus
* Proven expertise in storytelling and content creation, while maintaining consistent brand voice across a variety of channels
* Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to clearly and concisely articulate across teams


**If you’re interested in joining our mission as** 
**Product Marketing Manager** 
**, please apply by submitting your CV.**
 We believe in equal opportunity and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

title: Digitala affärsutvecklare till vårt helt nya team Optimering av kundresor!
description:
Är du intresserad av data, kundinsikter och digital utveckling? Är du en engagerad affärsutvecklare, med vana att ta projekt från start till mål?
   

  

 Vi söker digitala affärsutvecklare som kan utveckla och optimera våra digitala kundresor, på trygghansa.se och för våra varumärken Bilsport & MC och Atlantica. Som digital affärsutvecklare hos oss har du en central roll i att förbättra våra kunders digitala upplevelse, med kundinsiktsdrivna arbetsmetoder. Du behöver ha bred erfarenhet av kundresearbete, optimering i digitala kanaler och ha goda projektledaregenskaper.
   

  

**Om jobbet | Driva initiativ från idé till genomförande med mål att höja kundnöjdhet**
 Som digital affärsutvecklare i vårt nystartade team Optimering av kundresor arbetar du med att vara ansvarig för och stödja initiativ från idé till genomförande. Målet är att höja kundnöjdheten, öka försäljningen och förbättra servicenivåerna i våra digitala kundmöten. Som digital affärsutvecklare är du med på hela resan, utvecklar processer och metoder, och ser till att vi når våra mål.
   

  

 Utifrån data och kundinsikter arbetar du med konverteringsoptimering, med hjälp av t.ex. A/B-testning och multivariat testning. Du samarbetar både inom det egna teamet med andra digitala affärsutvecklare och webbanalytiker, och tvärfunktionellt med webbmanagers, UX-designers, affärsansvariga, agila utvecklingsteam mm. Tillsammans omsätter ni insikter och idéer till konkreta lösningar som gör skillnad.
   

  

**Dina Huvudsakliga Arbetsuppgifter Är Att**
* ta del av insikter och data från våra digitala kundresor, och omsätta dessa till agerbara förbättringsinitiativ.
* ansvara för digitala projekt från start till mål, följa upp resultat och planera för optimering framåt.
* samarbeta med andra roller inom teamet, inom det digitala området och i affärsverksamheten för att identifiera möjligheter och behov, och genomföra förbättringar.
* hålla dig uppdaterad om nya trender och tekniska möjligheter inom digital marknadsföring.


 Rollen är placerad i Stockholm, resor till Malmö kan förekomma. Du rapporterar till Chef, Optimering kundresor. Teamet ingår i avdelningen Digital business.
   

  

**Om dig | Digital affärsutvecklare med erfarenhet av tvärfunktionella projekt**
 För att lyckas i rollen behöver du ha några års erfarenhet av arbete i digitala kanaler, med fokus på att arbeta med optimering och konvertering. Du ska ha erfarenhet av digital affärsutveckling, men uppskattar särskilt för att arbeta med försäljning och kundnöjdhet.
   

  

 Du kommer att jobba med många olika funktioner och det är mycket viktigt att du är bra på, och tycker om att samarbeta utanför det egna expertområdet. Du har en förkärlek för att fördjupa dig i statistik, datapresentationer och utfall.
   

  

**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* 3 till 5 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av digital försäljning, optimering, kundresor eller service inom B2B eller B2C.
* relevant högskoleutbildning, t.ex. inom digital marknadsföring, företagsekonomi, interaktionsdesign, medie- och kommunikationsvetenskap, eller motsvarande utbildning, t.ex. från IHM eller Berghs.
* erfarenhet av att vara ansvarig för tvärfunktionella projekt med digitalt fokus, baserat på kundinsikter och annan data.
* god förmåga att kommunicera på både svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


**Det Är Meriterande Om Du Har**
* erfarenhet från att använda AI som arbetsredskap för utveckling av digitala kundmöten.
* erfarenhet av och kunskaper i Adobe Analytics eller andra verktyg för digital optimering, t.ex. Hotjar.


 Som person är du engagerad och får saker att hända, men du är också lyhörd, lösningsfokuserad och lär gärna av andra. Du är strukturerad i dina aktiviteter, vilket gör att dina kollegor och uppdragsgivare förstår vad som görs och känner engagemang.
   

  

**Om oss | Engagerad och inkluderande arbetsplats**
 Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta i en dynamisk och utvecklingsorienterad miljö med ett dedikerat team och stora möjligheter att påverka kundupplevelser på våra digitala plattformar.
   

  

 Du blir du en del av ett team med kunniga och nyfikna kollegor i ett företag som lever efter följande kännetecken – vi skapar utveckling, vi visar tillit, och vi tar ansvar.
   

  

 Vi tror att ett personligt engagemang är bra både för dig och för företaget och du har därför möjlighet att använda några arbetsdagar per år till ideellt arbete.
   

  

 Vi inser betydelsen av och jobbar kontinuerligt för att vara en inkluderande arbetsplats, där du ska känna dig trygg i att vara dig själv.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder stor flexibilitet i hur du genomför ditt arbete och mycket goda möjligheter till att växa i din roll. Här har du möjlighet att både jobba hemifrån och på ett modernt och lättillgängligt kontor för att träffa kollegor, samverka och nätverka.
   

  

**Nyfiken?**
 Välkommen med din ansökan via länken nedan. Då urvalet sker löpande ser vi gärna att du inkommer med din ansökan snarast möjligt, dock senast 2025-03-07. Vi kan komma att ta ner annonsen innan sista ansökningsdag.
   

  

 Vid frågor om tjänsten, vänligen kontakta rekryterande chef Cilla Lindqvist via mejl cilla.lindqvist@trygghansa.se. Vänligen notera att vi inte tar emot ansökningar per mejl.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

 Slutkandidater kommer att genomgå en bakgrundskontroll.
   

  

 Vi undanber oss kontakt från annons-, konsult- och rekryteringsföretag gällande våra annonserade roller.
   

  

**Fackliga representanter**
 Akademikerföreningen: Lena Darin, 070-16 82 844
   

  

 Forena: Elias Bakk, 070-730 68 54
   

  

**En trygg arbetsplats**
 Vi sätter människan och mångfald i fokus och är övertygade om att samarbete och olika perspektiv skapar de bästa förutsättningarna för utveckling. Hos oss blir du en del av ett team med kunniga och nyfikna kollegor och en inkluderande arbetsplats med ett stort hjärta.
   

  

 Vi uppmuntrar därför alla, oavsett kön, ålder, ursprung eller bakgrund, att söka tjänsten.
   

  

 Läs mer om hur det är att arbeta på Trygg-Hansa
   

  

 Vi hänger på din utvecklingsresa om du är med på vår
   

  

 Hos oss är utveckling och lärande något som ständigt pågår – och vi vill att du växer. Vi ser det som en stark motivationskraft att du vill dela med dig av din kunskap och erfarenhet för att på så sätt både inspirera och utvecklas tillsammans med dina kollegor, kunder och partners.
   

  

 Oavsett vad som driver dig är vi där och stöttar dig under din utvecklingsresa hos oss.
   

  

 Utforska dina möjligheter här
   

  

**Är våra kännetecken också dina?**
 Visa tillit
   

  

 Hos Trygg-Hansa bygger vi på varandras tillit när vi rör oss ut på okänd mark som morgondagens trygghetsskapare. Vi tror att tillit och frihet under ansvar motiverar din nyfikenhet och ditt mod att gå nya vägar. Du får ledare och kollegor som lägger vikt vid både trivsel och resultat.
   

  

 Hos Trygg-Hansa upplever du en kultur som bygger på tillit, samspel och utveckling hela vägen runt.
   

  

 Ta ansvar
   

  

 När du börjar på Trygg-Hansa kommer du snabbt att upptäcka att ansvar är något som betyder mycket. Ju mer ansvar du vill ha, desto mer får du när du visar att du kan leva upp till det.
   

  

 Här får du mandat att utforska nya möjligheter, koncept och lösningar som skapar trygghet för kunder, kollegor och samhälle idag och imorgon.
   

  

 Skapa utveckling
   

  

 På Trygg-Hansa går du i spetsen och skapar utvecklingen tillsammans med dina kollegor. Det kräver både mod, vilja och förmågan att gå nya vägar. Vi kämpar varje dag för att utveckla vår position som en av Nordens största trygghetsskapare.
   

  

 Det ger stora möjligheter för dig som kan, vill och vågar sätta fart på din egen och företagets utveckling.

title: Frontend Software Architect within eHealth
description:
*Cambio is one of the Nordics' leading suppliers in eHealth with a comprehensive offering for the entire health and care chain. Our eHealth solutions support healthcare professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish health and social care. We are growing continuously and now have about 1000 employees in several countries.*
**The position**
 As a Software Architect, you will join our new development team within the e-health domain. The team will be a part of our organization responsible for developing our new platform built upon open standards that will serve the future of eHealth. The platform is designed to support enhanced data accessibility, innovation, and interoperability at scale.
   

  

 In this position, you will enter an early stage of the development process and work with complex information systems designed for innovation and interoperability. We work with information systems that have very high requirements to scale which means you will fundamentally change how open platforms of the future will play a role in healthcare and welfare improvement.
   

  

 A key part of Cambio Platform is to be able to share the development and management of clinical concepts and their surrounding artifacts such as apps, forms, terminologies, and openEHR archetypes and templates. Your team will enable us and our customers to accelerate, and streamline collaboration and development of apps and informatics within Cambio Platform and the wider eHealth ecosystem. As a Software Architect, you are a hands-on technical person with strong technical leadership qualities. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge solutions and influence the product and the team from the beginning.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design and develop frontend architectures for scalable eHealth applications, ensuring compliance with openEHR and FHIR standards.
* Collaborate with backend developers, UX/UI designers, and product teams to deliver seamless and user-friendly healthcare applications.
* Drive the adoption of best practices in front-end development, including performance optimization, security, and maintainability.
* Stay current with industry trends, tools, and technologies to ensure our solutions remain innovative and competitive.
* Work closely with stakeholders to translate business needs into technical solutions, balancing short-term requirements with long-term architectural goals.


 At Cambio, we encourage taking initiatives that contribute to the development of the company and ourselves. For us, it is important that you should have the opportunity to grow, both as a person and as an employee. Our culture is described through the words “Trust”, “Care” and “Together” which permeate everything we do.
   

  

**About You**
 We are searching for a passionate frontend focused Software Architect to join our new development team within the eHealth domain.
   

  

**Requirements**
* Deep understanding of Typescript and React.
* Deep understanding of State Management Frameworks such as Redux, Saga.
* Proven experience in front-end performance optimization techniques (e.g., lazy loading, code splitting, caching).
* Familiarity with responsive web design and development, including mobile-first approaches.
* Familiarity with DevOps practices.
* Familiarity with tools like Docker and Kubernetes.
* Excellent communication skills in English


**It’s a bonus if you have**
* Experience in the eHealth domain and knowledge of Open EHR, FHIR or SNOMED CT it is a bonus
* Understanding of UX/UI principles, with experience collaborating with designers on user-centric solutions.
* Experience deploying and managing frontend applications in cloud environments such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
* Communication skills in Swedish


**What We Offer**
 A dynamic and stimulating work environment where you will have the opportunity to work on exciting projects with a talented team of professionals. You will be part of a company that is committed to excellence and innovation in the eHealth industry.
   

  

 As a Senior Software Architect, you will be one of the first members of this new development team, which means you will have a fundamental influence on the product and the team from the very beginning. You will have the opportunity to shape the future of e-health with an open platform that is set to revolutionize the industry.
   

  

**Place of employment** 
 : Linköping or Stockholm
   

  

 At Cambio we value a healthy work-life balance, and to encourage that we apply a hybrid working-model. Together with your team you decide which days you work at the office. On the remaining days you can work remotely from home, but you are always more than welcome to work at the office too.
   

  

**Scope** 
 : Full time
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
   

  

**Other:** 
 We screen the applications and hold interviews continuously so please send your application as soon as possible via the link.
   

  

 We encourage and eagerly welcome all applications, but we will only consider candidates who are located and have the legal right to work in
 **Sweden.** 
 We will ask for verification during the process.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
 Read more about us
 **here!**
 Are you interested in Cambio but you don’t feel that this position is the perfect match? Check out our other open positions at the career site
 **here!**
 Cambio Healthcare Systems is Sweden’s leading suppliers of healthcare information systems and a growing player in the European market with just over 100,000 users across general and university hospitals, specialist units and outpatient units. Through the use of our integrated solutions, our customers provide services to 4 million patients.

title: Conversion Rate Optimization Specialist to Scandic Hotels Group - Stockholm, Sweden (Office/Hybrid)
description:
***Conversion Rate Optimization Specialist to Scandic Hotels Group - Stockholm, Sweden (Office/Hybrid)***




  





**Location:** 
 Stockholm
 



  





 Scandic is the largest hotel operator in the Nordics with a network of about 280 hotels and 58,000 hotel rooms in operation and under development in six countries. With a lot of curiosity and a truly customer-centric approach, we’re creating the next generation digital experiences for our customers and guests.
 



  





 As our CRO specialist, you will have a central position in running one of the largest e-commerce businesses within the travel industry in the Nordics. Your main goal is to convert visitors into customers by optimizing user experiences and identifying barriers in the conversion funnel based on data. You will set up A/B and multivariate tests from start to end, including research and analysis, and inspire team members and stakeholders into a more data-driven mindset.
 



  





 In this role, your will be part of an international product and customer-experience team consisting of CRO-specialists, UX and UI designers and product owners, focusing on supporting our customers and guest throughout the entire customer journey with digital solutions and optimized booking experiences.
 



  





**What you’ll do:** 



* Analyze our digital platforms, user behavior and key metrics using tools like Adobe Analytics, Hojtar and similar to identify areas and build hypotheses for improvement
* Design and implement experiments such as A/B, multivariate, or split tests to test hypotheses for optimization from start to end including the analysis
* Continuously measure the performance of implemented tests and changes, providing detailed reports on what works and what doesn't
* Conduct usability tests in collaboration with UX designers and gather feedback to identify pain points in the customer journey, ensuring a smooth and effective experiences
* Make reports and presentations to communicate test outcomes, insights, and recommendations to stakeholders and developer teams
* Together with CRO Specialist, coordinate and communicate with product owners, designers, developers and QA to drive projects forward with end-to-end CRO management
* Identify and support in personalization opportunities



  





**Skills & Requirements** 




**Who are you?** 



* 2+ years of experience working with CRO and A/B testing for web and app platforms, preferably within hospitality and/or e-commerce
* An analytical mindset with the ability to draw actionable insights from data
* Experience from CRO and insight tools such as Adobe Target, Hotjar or similar
* A good grasp of user-centered design principles and how user experience affects conversion rates
* Knowledge of digital marketing landscape with and understanding of SEO, SEM and content marketing
* Excellent communication skills with the ability to present findings and recommendations to both technical and non-technical stakeholders
* Education within Conversion Management or Analytics
* Full working proficiency in English



  





**About Scandic:** 




 Scandic Hotels is highly committed and proactive when it comes to Diversity & Inclusion initiatives. We are also a responsible corporate citizen and actively engaged in sustainability efforts. We have a long legacy of driving sustainability action in the hospitality industry. With around 20 000 team members, over 10 million guests and 4 million meetings a year – we have great power to drive transformation and inspire change at scale, for a better and more sustainable tomorrow.
 



  





 Our HQ is situated in newly renovated spaces right by Hagaparken on Sveavägen 167 in Stockholm. We love to be in the office but are a flexible workplace and offer a hybrid setup that suits our team members. Join in on our warm and inclusive culture and take part in all our different social activities.
 



  





**How to apply:** 




 We welcome applications in either Swedish or English.
 



  





 We are not able to provide any relocation assistance and will therefore only accept applicants already based in Sweden.
 



  





 Due to GDPR, we only accept applications through our website.
 



  





 We're excited to hear from you soon!
 



  





**About the company** 




 We know that we reach further when we assent to our differences. At Scandic we want you to be yourself and develop in the direction you want to go, with the foundation of safe conditions and fair agreements. Bring your experiences, engagement and your way of thinking – contribute to a culture where we genuinely care about each other, our guests and our planet. Welcome to Scandic.
 



  





 Do you share our values?
 



  





**BE A PRO** 
**BE YOU** 
**BE CARING** 
**BE BOLD** 




  





**Contact Person** 




 Michaela Liljedahl
 



 Michaela.Liljedahl@scandichotels.com

title: Engineering Manager
description:
We’re a cutting-edge tech-enabled bank on a mission to revolutionize financing for small businesses across 7 markets in northern Europe. Our innovative solutions aim to simplify access to financing and enable growth for small businesses. As we scale, we are now looking for an Engineering Manager to be part of our journey to transform the financial landscape for entrepreneurs.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As an Engineering Manager at Qred, you'll play a crucial role in shaping our organizational design, people management, and way of working. You'll be acting as a development manager for the Revenue domain, which means you will be responsible for leading and supporting our 4 development teams with one Tech Lead per team. Your focus will be to ensure alignment with our methodologies, and fostering collaboration within the Revenue domain. This role calls for a visionary leader with a technical background and a passion for building high-performing teams.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* People Management: Oversee performance & staff management of our of engineering teams consisting of ~15 engineers
* Efficient Way of Working: Champion methodologies like Agile, Lean, Continuous Delivery, and DevOps to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of our engineering processes. Drive and align our Qred engineering maturity model through all teams
* Collaboration and Cross-Functional Work: Foster strong collaboration and communication between Engineering, Product Management, and UX Design
* Organizational Design: Define team structures, optimize resource allocation and match personalities, ensure scalability and productivity within the engineering organization
* Recruitment and Retention: Lead the recruitment strategy for Engineering for the domain, attracting top talent and fostering a culture of retention
* Enable Qred: You will be part of the Revenue Domain and you will have a tight collaboration with CTO, Architects and Chef Revenue Officer. Your focus will be what is best for Qred, then the product department


**Requirements**
* A passion for mentoring and developing engineering talent
* A technical background with broad full-stack experience, preferred language is Javascript (nodejs / react / react native), we don't expect you to code but we expect you to understand the challenges our engineers face in their competence and in the cross-functional team
* You would need two years of experience in a Head of Engineering or development manager role in a sizable organization, preferably in a domain structure organization
* We also see that you have a university engineering degree
* Deep understanding of Agile methodologies, DevOps practices, and modern software development principles
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build strong relationships across functions
* Alignment with Qred's leadership values: Visionary, Empowering, Lead by example
* We have employees from all parts of the world, English and understanding cultural differences are hard requirements
* You like to meet your department and get to know the persons, we believe in non-formal meetings and chats, therefore you need to like an office-first approach to meet the teams as their office days are spread over the week


**One last thing**
 This is a full-time, permanent position based in our headquarters in Stockholm. Don’t wait to send in your application as we are reviewing applications on a rolling basis. While the start date is flexible, the right candidate can join us immediately
   

  

*Qred celebrates diversity and does not discriminate based on ethnicity, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability status, or any other applicable characteristics protected by law.*
 Qred is an international FinTech scale-up that specializes in digital financing solutions for small businesses, with operations in the Nordics, Benelux, Germany and Brazil. We are passionate about helping small businesses thrive and grow, by providing them with business loans, factoring and credit cards. Right now we’re in an exciting phase of our journey that focuses on growth through smart product development and technology fuelled by international expansion.

title: Marketing automation specialist till Handelsbanken
description:
*Vill du vara med och utveckla Handelsbankens arbete med automatiserad kundkommunikation?*
**Om oss**
 Hos oss på Handelsbanken Kommunikation, Marknad & Insikter arbetar vi med hela den digitala kundresan för att säkerställa att våra kanaler används effektivt och kontinuerligt utvecklas baserat på data och analyser. Genom att omvandla affärs- och kundbehov till kommunikation och flöden skapar vi värde för både befintliga och potentiella kunder. Som Marketing Automation Specialist blir du en del av ett agilt team med kompetenser inom strategisk kommunikation och marknadsföring, inklusive Service Designer (UX), Digital marketing manager, analytiker, MA Campaign manager, Business manager, Content manager mfl. Du kommer att samarbeta tvärfunktionellt över avdelningen och med andra områden såsom analys & insikter, IT, produktområden och kontorsrörelsen.
   

  

**Din roll**
 I denna roll ansvarar du för att implementera vår strategi inom marketing automation. Genom att analysera kunddata och beteenden, skapar och optimerar du automatiserade kundresor i Salesforce, med syfte att skapa lojaliserande kommunikation gentemot våra kunder. Tester och experiment ser du som en naturlig del av ditt arbetssätt för att hela tiden agera på insikter och öka resultat och effekt. Vidare säkerställer du att processerna följer gällande dataskydds- och integritetslagar samt bidrar till att utveckla engagerande och relevant innehåll genom interna samarbeten. Du får även en viktig roll i att utbilda, stödja och inspirera organisationen i användningen av marketing automation-verktyg och best practices.
   

  

 ,
   

  

**Din profil**
 Vi söker dig som har en relevant högskoleutbildning inom marknadsföring, kommunikation, ekonomi eller liknande. Du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med Salesforce Marketing Cloud eller andra liknande plattformar. Meriterande är även erfarenhet av att arbeta inom en stor organisation. Har du dessutom erfarenhet av att driva förändringsarbete eller utveckling inom marketing automation är det meriterande.
   

  

 Du är analytisk och grundar dina beslut i data, vilket gör att du kan omvandla analyser till insikter för kontinuerlig optimering. Du arbetar strukturerat och noggrant, både i plattformen och tillsammans med ditt team. När du stöter på utmaningar hittar du lösningar och driver arbetet framåt. Du trivs i samarbete med andra och ser värdet i olika perspektiv och kompetenser för att nå gemensamma mål.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
* en trygg och stabil arbetsgivare
* dynamiskt och stimulerande arbete
* work-life balance
* kompetens- och karriärutveckling
* inkluderande- och jämställd arbetsmiljö
* konkurrenskraftigt förmånspaket


**Kontaktuppgifter**

 Johan Mannerstråle, +46(0)730329568, johan.mannerstrale@handelsbanken.se

 Emelie Moberg, emelie.moberg@handelsbanken.se
   

  

**Facklig representant Finansförbundet:** 
 Ronita Bergman, +46702499223, ronita.bergman@handelsbanken.se
   

  

**Facklig representant Akademikerföreningen:**
 Ingrid Widgren, +46708644140, ingrid.widgren@handelsbanken.se

title: Produktägare
description:
**På Migrationsverket arbetar vi med en av vår tids stora samhällsfrågor – migrationen. Totalt är vi cirka 6 000 personer här, och vi har ett ovanligt viktigt jobb!**
 Migrationsverket har inlett en digitaliseringsresa. Gamla system ska avvecklas och nya utvecklas och implementeras samtidigt som vi måste hålla gamla system igång med hög driftsäkerhet. Vi satsar på vår digitaliseringsverksamhet och söker nu en
 **produktägare med erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling** 
 som vill vara med på resan! Din placering blir
 **i Sundbyberg eller Norrköping.**
 Vi söker dig som brinner för att skapa hållbara lösningar. Lösningar som innebär bra användarupplevelser för våra målgrupper. Lösningar som bidrar till att vi uppnår önskade effekter med utvecklingssatsningar. Du kommer att arbeta i projektform eller annan uppdragsform. Dina användare är såväl sökande som medarbetare internt på Migrationsverket samt externa aktörer och du blir en viktig kugge i myndighetens verksamhetsutveckling.
   

  

 Som produktägare arbetar du tillsammans med utvecklingsteamen bestående av systemutvecklare, kravanalytiker, testare, och arkitekter samt med övriga produktägare på Migrationsverket. Utöver de närmsta kollegorna samverkar du även med förvaltningsledare, processledare, projektledare, enhetschefer, controllers, etc. Dina kontaktytor är många och det nätverk som du kommer att bygga upp är stort. Du får en stor möjlighet att påverka och forma utvecklingen av våra produkter. Som produktägare blir du spindeln i nätet där det är viktigt att kunna kommunicera och förmedla dina planer med alla intressenter på olika nivåer.
   

  

**I den här rollen kommer du att:**
* Skapa kortsiktiga och långsiktiga roadmaps och sätta en vision för produkterna inom ditt område.
* Säkerställa att produktmål är framtagen och tydligt kommunicerad.
* Samla in och sammanställa behov från användarna som omsätts i tekniska lösningar.
* Samla in och analysera feedback från kunder, användare och andra intressenter. Tydligt definiera och kommunicera produktkrav till utvecklingsteamet.
* Ansvara för produktens backlog i Jira, inklusive prioritering av funktioner och krav.
* Ansvar för Backlogg refinement: Tillsammans med utvecklingsteamen bryta ner krav till tydliga arbetspaket för utvecklarna.
* Ansvara för uppföljning inom produkternas ekonomiska ram, både gentemot utvecklingsteamen och gentemot övriga intressenter.
* Kommunicera med intressenter inom verksamhet, IT och externa parter.
* Följa upp leveranser och hålla kontinuerlig kontakt med externa och interna intressenter.
* Samarbeta tätt med övriga produktägare/produktansvarig, förvaltningsledare, processledare, scum-master, utvecklare, UX-designers, kravare och testare för att leverera högkvalitativa lösningar
* Samarbeta med enhetschef, objektägare m.fl. för övergripande produktriktning & vision.


**Den här beskrivningen passar in på dig som person:**
 Vi ser gärna att du är en prestigelös och utvecklingsorienterad ledare med ett stort driv, positivitet, effektivitet och beslutsamhet. Du ser hela verksamhetens bästa i agerande och beslut. Du tänker strategiskt och har ett brett perspektiv på frågor. När förutsättningar och mål ändras har du inga problem med att ändra inriktning och anpassa dig.
   

  

 Som person är du engagerad och gillar att samarbeta med andra och har lätt att skapa och bibehålla professionella relationer. I möten lyssnar och kommunicerar du på ett konstruktivt sätt och kan lösa konflikter och anpassa dig till situationen.
   

  

**Du som söker har:**
* Utbildning på högskolenivå alternativt motsvarande förvärvad yrkeserfarenhet som arbetsgivaren bedömer relevant för rollen.
* Minst 4 års aktuell yrkeserfarenhet som produktägare, produktledare eller förvaltningsledare inom mjukvaruutveckling i komplexa större organisationer.
* God kommunikativ förmåga och uttrycker dig väl i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska.
* God analytiskt förmåga och löser komplexa frågor.
* Svenskt medborgarskap


**Det är meriterande om du har:**
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i en central roll med många olika intressenter och kravställare i en större komplex organisation.
* Erfarenhet av arbete enligt agila metoder och principer
* God teknisk förståelse och förmåga att kommunicera tekniska termer till olika intressenter
* Erfarenhet av att ta fram beslutsunderlag och hålla presentationer, muntliga såväl som skriftliga.


**Det här är vårt erbjudande till dig:**
 Vi vill att du ska känna att du utvecklas och erbjuder möjligheten att gå kurser och besöka konferenser. Du får ett omväxlande arbete där du kan påverka utvecklingen av våra tekniska lösningar, samtidigt som du kommer att knyta an många nya kontaktytor. Vi tycker det är viktigt att våra medarbetare kan kombinera arbets- och privatliv på ett så flexibelt sätt som möjligt och erbjuder möjligheten att kombinera jobb på kontoret med arbete hemifrån. Resor kan förekomma.
   

  

**Upplysningar**
**Placeringsort:** 
 Sundbyberg eller Norrköping (viss närvaro i Sundbyberg krävs)
   

  

**Arbetstid:** 
 Kontorsarbetstid (flextid).
   

  

**Tjänsten:** 
 Heltid, tillsvidareanställning med provanställning.
   

  

**Tillträde:** 
 enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

 Läs mer om hur det att arbeta med IT på Migrationsverket här och om våra förmåner här.
   

  

 Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) kommer att genomföras. Utifrån detta ställs krav på svenskt medborgarskap.
 **Anställningen förutsätter en godkänd säkerhetsprövning.**
**Vill du veta mer?**
 Om du har frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef, Johanna Robinson Aalto via e-post: johanna.robinson.aalto@migrationsverket.se
   

  

 För frågor om rekryteringsprocessen kan du kontakta rekrytering@migrationsverket.se
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Välkommen med dina ansökningshandlingar senast den
 **24 februari 2025** 
 . Vi tar emot din ansökan via vårt rekryteringssystem.
   

  

 Migrationsverket, Huvudkontor, Digitaliserings- och utvecklingsavdelningen

title: Senior Quantitative User Experience Researcher (Frontend) (Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**We have only scratched the surface.** 
 The online travel industry is an extremely dynamic and competitive space. We aim to deliver compelling designs that create a world-class customer experience. You will have a key role in defining the future of our products that reach millions of customers. Despite our size, we operate in a startup-like environment.
   

  

**Work in the heart of Asia.** 
 This is an amazing opportunity if you’re looking for an exciting adventure abroad while expanding your international research capabilities. You get a chance to live in one of the most beautiful and most visited cities in the world!
   

  

**This position is open to worldwide candidates and we will assist you with a generous relocation package, ensuring a smooth transition to working and living in Bangkok.**
 Senior UX Researchers have the breadth and depth of research method skills applicable to a wide range of questions, and over time develop standout areas of research excellence. A long track record and documented success in both research itself and achieving organizational impact is characteristic of Senior UX Researchers. The ability to integrate research into the work of colleagues in other roles makes the Senior UX Researcher effective and helps him/her achieve out-sized impact from research efforts. This ability, along with others that turn research into a strategic asset for Agoda’s decisions and processes, comes from a maturity in overall research approach emphasizing the highest benefit from all research investments.
   

  

**Qualifications:**
* Masters Degree or PhD or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Human-Computer Interaction, Information Science, Psychology, Social Science, or any related field
* 10+ years of relevant experience in consumer-facing business domains.
* Expert in Quantitative research. (Log analysis, internal metrics triangulation, survey design, response effects, sampling, crosstabs, and statistical concepts, etc.)
* But, also has experience with Qualitative and user-centered design methods (individual and group interviews, diary studies, direct observation, think-aloud usability testing, etc.)
* Comfortable with planning, scoping, conducting, analyzing and communicating research.
* Experience in evaluating, negotiating, and working with external research vendors.
* Be able to describe user problems and business opportunities to a variety of stakeholders by leveraging both quantitative and qualitative data.
* Ability to demonstrate critical thinking beyond business requests
* Is a great storyteller and communicator, able to speak fluently to business people, product teams, designers, engineers, and other stakeholders. (in English)
* Enjoys collaborative work in a dynamic, data-driven, and creative environment.


**Responsibilities:**
 General Role Expectations:
   

  

* Conducts research end-to-end for high impact, leading stakeholders to the best collaboration with research for their goals
* Initiates research efforts serving Product Vertical goals in the medium- and long-term given a well-informed understanding of the business
* Formulates programmes of study and cumulative knowledge sharing relevant to the strategic objectives of their teams
* Leads projects that are collaborations with other stakeholders
* Accounts for the pros and cons of various research methodologies, and mentors others the use of techniques and tools for high-quality execution


 Research Skills:
   

  

* Expertise at evaluating research opportunities, particularly with ambiguous requests e.g. importance, urgency, and impact
* Ability to manage, challenge and shape inbound research requests, and propose solid research projects or programs
* Excellent project execution, while exploring alternate methods, mixed methods and innovative approaches
* Deep understands of the pros and cons of quantitative and qualitative research – and use of this knowledge to direct projects to appropriate methods
* Deep expertise in at least one domain (eg. Pricing), a user type (eg. Business traveler) or a method (eg. Diary Study), being the “go-to person” on the research team for this
* Triangulation of findings, methods, and theories within a project to ensure reliability and depth of insight
* Ability to maximize the value and efficiency of research by applying secondary research and expert inspection methods
* Solid knowledge of various software tools common in the field (e.g. for surveys, diary studies, analysis), and ability to apply the right tool to the problem
* Solid knowledge of GDPR, data compliance and ethics that is present in all of their activities


 Communication & Collaboration:
   

  

* Drives cross discipline/department collaboration via research insights/activities
* Collaborates efficiently with other researchers and other disciplines with clear commitment to shared ownership
* Shows excellent communication skills; tailored communication style for different audiences, concise and to the point, open to take input and feedback
* Contributes to the communication and implementation of agreed standards of research excellence across the organization
